data.title: Auburn Hills, Pontiac, Southfield, Walled Lake, Waterford, Michigan
data.meta_description: Easterseals Michigan- Auburn Hills, Pontiac, Southfield, Walled Lake, Waterford, Michigan
data.text:
Easterseals Michigan serves and supports people with disabilities or special needs and their families so they can successfully live, learn, work and play in their communities.

Adult Services: A comprehensive array of behavioral health services to support the recovery of individuals with a serious mental illness or co-occurring mental health and substance use disorder.

Autism (ASD) Services: Innovative therapies as well as training, support, and education services for those with an autism spectrum disorder and their families.

Children's Services: Comprehensive, multi-faceted services for families with children from birth through 18 years of age in Genesee, Kent, Macomb and Oakland Counties.

Collaborative Solutions: Behavioral health services for Oakland County residents who are involved in the criminal justice system, including diversion from jail into treatment for those who have committed nonviolent misdemeanors.
